nodes.text: Rey and the Secret Treasure – Chapter 2
"Rey and the Secret Treasure – Chapter 2" is the ninth episode of the animated shorts series Star Wars Roll Out. It was first released October 4, 2019 on YouTube.
Rey stumbles upon a treasure trove of rare parts and a mysterious flower, but she'll have to protect them both when the poachers return.
In the opening credits, BB-8 and a Star Wars ball lead the way followed by Rey, Maz Kanata, Finn, Captain Phasma, two stormtroopers, Ben Solo, Han Solo, Chewbacca, and three porgs.

The episode opens with Rey marveling over her discovery of jewels. She salvages them from the cave. Meanwhile, Teedo and his gang are hauling a crate of salvage over the desert sands when Teedo spots Rey's speeder and the cave entrance with his macrobinoculars. He and his Teedo gang laugh with glee.

Meanwhile, Rey has collected several jewels and spots a potted flower growing under a spot of sunlight. She waters the potted plant, which begins to recover. Just then, Teedo and his gang storm the cave riding a large tubular machine which sucks up the wreckage and debris. Rey flees the Teedos, narrowly escaping being sucked up by the machine. She flees onto the edge of a cliff and leaps to safety on a stony staircase.

The Teedos' giant vacuum machine sucks up portions of the staircase. Rey flees but finds herself caught in the vacuum created by the Teedos' giant vacuum machine. Rey struggles against the force of the air current as the episode draws to a close.
